name: The Old Prince
description:
What if the Little Prince managed to get out of the earth in search of his Rose, what if years passed of struggle and hardships through the universe without being able to find his asteroid, but what if in the end he finally find it? 

Now an old prince, he finds his asteroid changed, something happened, where's his Rose? 

Discover another take after the ending of the original story, in this narrative experience.

Controls:
Movement: WASD + Mouse Look 
Run: Shift

A project for the Cologne Game Lab "Adaptation" of The Little Prince by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry. A tribute to one of the greatest works in the history of literature.

Game Design/Concept/Art: Rodolink
Programming: Sabin George
Script: Andrew Nolen
Sounds: Thiago Gatti
